meanings.definition: Marked with a series of small curves or indentations.
meanings.sent1: The invected design on the bracelet added a unique touch.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had an invected frame that caught the eye.
meanings.sent3: The invected pattern on the cake frosting looked like tiny waves.
meanings.sent4: Her invected hairstyle resembled a bumpy road.
meanings.sent5: The invected texture of the fabric felt rough to the touch.

meanings.definition: Having a border with a series of small curves or indentations.
meanings.sent1: The invected edges of the picture frame gave it a vintage feel.
meanings.sent2: The antique vase had an invected base that added elegance.
meanings.sent3: The invected border on the invitation card looked like a fancy ribbon.
meanings.sent4: Her invected necklace chain sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The invected pattern on the rug created a cozy atmosphere in the room.
